      • processReport

        private void processReport(String reportFile)
                    throws de.weltraumschaf.commons.ApplicationException
        Processes a single report file. Exits the application with exit code != ExitCodeImpl.OK, if SAXException.SAXException or IOException was thrown.
        Parameters:
        reportFile - file name of Checkstyle report
        Throws:
        de.weltraumschaf.commons.ApplicationException - if any I/O or XML parse error occurs

      • getEnv

        String getEnv()
        Wraps non side effect free method for mocking in tests.
        Returns:
        the string value of the variable, or null if the variable is not defined in the system environment
